as you rapidly move more applications and workloads to the cloud applying
traditional IT governance practices becomes more difficult with the increase in cloud adoption it becomes
increasingly time-consuming to provision cloud accounts and deliver services and it's hard to answer important questions
like who is access to which accounts how much is each count spending and are my
accounts in compliance with standards like HIPAA and PCI as a result of these challenges and questions either adoption
stalls while traditional processes are adapted to the cloud or you are forced to accept increased financial security
and compliance risk governance at scale is an AWS best practice that you can
leverage to apply IT governance strategies in the cloud to achieve agility compliance and cost savings at
scale native AWS services like AWS Service Catalog are part of this best
practice but many organizations may have hundreds of accounts and thousands of users that require access to cloud
resources enabling governance controls for deploying services as traditionally
required time and labor AWS partner products like cloud tamer do help
organizations implement governance at scale best practices in a single automated solution reducing the time and
labor required to bring together these native services to help with easy orchestration and application across
